Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products d%A1c Reagent Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products d%A1c Reagent Kit, Calibrator Kit 18, and FS Calibrator 1 for automated measurement of percent glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c) in whole blood using the VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use; used to determine percent glycated hemoglobin (%A1c) in human whole blood to monitor long-term glycemic control in individuals with diabetes mellitus and to calibrate VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems.
